channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CASSANDRA-20541] RowFilter incorrectly hides deletion information from replica filtering protection
item.description:
MultiNodeTableWalkWithoutReadRepairTest surfaced an error with seed 6640281155419111674 that exposes RowFilter purging deletion information required by RFP when the query needs reconciliation. This is broken in all currently supported releases, much like CASSANDRA-19007, but it has a much simpler fix.

accord.utils.Property$PropertyError: Property error detected:
Seed = 6640281155419111674
Examples = 10
Pure = true
Error: Unexpected results for query: SELECT * FROM ks1.tbl WHERE s0 = [(00000000-0000-1300-b500-000000000000, 'se.}\u0017H`4y|', '=q')] PER PARTITION LIMIT 74 LIMIT 654 ALLOW FILTERING
Steps: 400
Values:
	State:
		Setup:
		CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS ks1 WITH replication = {'class': 'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor': 3};
		CREATE TABLE ks1.tbl (
		    pk0 double,
		    ck0 boolean,
		    s0 vector<frozen<tuple<timeuuid, ascii, ascii>>, 1> static,
		    v0 ascii,
		    PRIMARY KEY (pk0, ck0)
		) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (ck0 DESC)
		    AND additional_write_policy = '99p'
		    AND allow_auto_snapshot = true
		    AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
		    AND caching = {'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'ALL'}
		    AND cdc = false
		    AND comment = ''
		    AND compaction = {'bucket_high': '1.604189461436093', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '13', 'min_threshold': '4', 'provide_overlapping_tombstones': 'ROW'}
		    AND compression = {'chunk_length_in_kb': '16', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.NoopCompressor'}
		    AND memtable = 'default'
		    AND crc_check_chance = 1.0
		    AND default_time_to_live = 0
		    AND extensions = {}
		    AND gc_grace_seconds = 864000
		    AND incremental_backups = true
		    AND max_index_interval = 2048
		    AND memtable_flush_period_in_ms = 0
		    AND min_index_interval = 128
		    AND read_repair = 'NONE'
		    AND speculative_retry = '99p';: org.apache.cassandra.distributed.test.cql3.MultiNodeTableWalkBase.MultiNodeState
	History:

gf')]) USING TIMESTAMP 3 -- on node3

item.summary: RowFilter incorrectly hides deletion information from replica filtering protection

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
5.0 ci_summary-1.html
trunk ci_summary.html

Note: The infrastructure to fix (in RowFilter) and test this (in RFP tests) doesn't exist in 4.x

Possible seed that should be fixed by this test

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Property error detected:
Seed = -1442217211599843968
Examples = 10
Pure = true
Steps: 400
Values:
	State: 
		Setup:
		CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS ks5 WITH replication = {'class': 'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor': 3};
		CREATE TABLE ks5.tbl (
		    pk0 int,
		    pk1 double,
		    ck0 varint,
		    s0 uuid static,
		    s1 frozen>, frozen>>> static,
		    v0 timeuuid,
		    PRIMARY KEY ((pk0, pk1), ck0)
		) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (ck0 ASC)
		    AND additional_write_policy = '99p'
		    AND allow_auto_snapshot = true
		    AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
		    AND caching = {'keys': 'NONE', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE'}
		    AND cdc = false
		    AND comment = ''
		    AND compaction = {'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4', 'only_purge_repaired_tombstones': 'true'}
		    AND compression = {'enabled': 'false'}
		    AND memtable = 'default'
		    AND crc_check_chance = 1.0
		    AND default_time_to_live = 0
		    AND extensions = {}
		    AND gc_grace_seconds = 864000
		    AND incremental_backups = true
		    AND max_index_interval = 2048
		    AND memtable_flush_period_in_ms = 0
		    AND min_index_interval = 128
		    AND read_repair = 'NONE'
		    AND speculative_retry = '99p';
		CREATE INDEX tbl_pk0 ON ks5.tbl(pk0) USING 'SAI';
		CREATE CUSTOM INDEX tbl_pk1 ON ks5.tbl(pk1) USING 'StorageAttachedIndex';
		CREATE CUSTOM INDEX tbl_ck0 ON ks5.tbl(ck0) USING 'StorageAttachedIndex';
		CREATE INDEX tbl_s0 ON ks5.tbl(s0) USING 'SAI';
		CREATE INDEX tbl_s1 ON ks5.tbl(FULL(s1)) USING 'SAI';
